text: The Heavy Entertainment Show is the eleventh studio album by English singer- songwriter Robbie Williams. It was released on 4 November 2016. ==Track listing== Notes * signifies an additional producer ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== Chart (2016) Peak position ===Year-end charts=== Chart (2016) Position Australian Albums (ARIA) 61 Austrian Albums (Ã–3 Austria) 35 Belgian Albums (Ultratop Flanders) 42 Belgian Albums (Ultratop Wallonia) 113 Dutch Albums (MegaCharts) 34 German Albums (Offizielle Top 100) 29 Italian Albums (FIMI) 60 Swiss Albums (Schweizer Hitparade) 29 UK Albums (OCC) 14 Chart (2017) Position Belgian Albums (Ultratop Flanders) 141 Swiss Albums (Schweizer Hitparade) 57 ==Certifications== !scope="row"|Worldwide (IFPI) | |700,000+ ==References== Category:2016 albums Category:Robbie Williams albums
